message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is worth $8,000 to both of us. I'm starting the negotiation with an offer of $7,500. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to make a counteroffer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $7,200 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to pay more. To continue our negotiation, I am proposing a counter-counteroffer of $7,400 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your budget.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I would like to counter your counteroffer with a proposal of $7,350 for the product.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I value your interest in our product and have decided to counter your offer with a price of $7,450. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value we both see in this product.
I appreciate your continued negotiation, Alice. I would like to counter your offer with a proposal of $7,400 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. Considering the mutual value we place on this product, I have decided to counter your offer with a price of $7,425. I believe this is a reasonable compromise that respects both our positions.
I appreciate your effort, Alice. I would like to counter your offer with a proposal of $7,400 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, I have decided to counter your offer with a price of $7,437.50 for the product. This reflects the value we both see in it, while also allowing for a fair transaction.
I appreciate your negotiation, Alice. I would like to counter your offer with a final proposal of $7,400 for the product.
